entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. My name is Alex, how can I help you today?
Finally! I've been on hold forever. I need to return this stupid VeloBand Pulse I bought. It's junk.
I apologize for the wait time, I understand you'd like to return your VeloBand Pulse. Can I get your order number, please?
It's #VF789234. And hurry up, I don't have all day.
Thank you. Okay, I have your order here. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse. What's the reason for the return?
It's not accurate! The heart rate monitor is all over the place. It's basically a fancy bracelet. I want my money back.
I understand your frustration. Let me quickly check the return policy. Okay, I see here you are well within our return timeframe. Our return policy allows for returns up to 90 days after purchase.
90 days? Really? I thought I only had a week or something. That's good, because I bought this thing like 15 days ago. So, I can definitely return the VeloBand Pulse?

Yes, absolutely. The VeloBand Pulse falls under our standard 90-day return policy. To process the return, I'll need to send you a prepaid shipping label. You simply pack up the smart watch in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location.
Original packaging? Ugh, I probably threw that away. Will that be a problem?
No worries, as long as the smart watch is packaged securely for shipping. It's more important that it arrives safely back to us. We just want to be able to process your refund as quickly as possible.
Okay, that's fine. So, what's the next step?

I'm generating the prepaid shipping label for you now. You should receive an email with the label and instructions within the next few minutes. Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, we'll process your refund back to your original payment method. This usually takes 7-10 business days.
Alright, that sounds good. So just to confirm, the email will have everything I need to send this back?
Yes, the email will contain the prepaid shipping label and all the necessary instructions. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help. I was expecting a fight, to be honest.
You're very welcome. We appreciate your business. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact us. Have a great day!
